DOC.brief_summary: Degenerative Lumbar spinal stenosis ( DLSS ) major problem public health primary reason old seek lumbar spine surgery . Acupuncture safe maybe effective DLSS evidence poor . Therefore , objective assessment acupuncture efficacy critical making informed decision appropriate role patient . A total 80 participant meet prior inclusion criterion recruit . The participant allocate acupuncture group placebo needle ( unpenetrated acupuncture ) group randomly . Twenty-four treatment provide 8 week . The primary change Modified Roland-Morris Disability Questionnaire ( RMDQ ) secondary outcome include change Number Rating Scale ( NRS ) ; change Self-paced Walking test ( SPWT ) ; change Swiss Spinal Stenosis Questionnaire ( SSSQ ) ; expectation acupuncture might help participant DLSS . All outcome assess baseline , and/or 4 , 8 , 20 32 week . Statistical analysis include independent sample t-test , Chi-squared test non-parametric test . The investigator hope result trial clarify value acupuncture DLSS help clinician make proper decision .
